meanings.definition: The act of selling or promoting phrases or expressions.
meanings.sent1: She made a living from her phrasemongerings at the market.
meanings.sent2: The phrasemongerings in the advertisement caught my attention.
meanings.sent3: The phrasemongerings at the comedy show had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: His phrasemongerings were like music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The phrasemongerings of the poet painted vivid images in my mind.

meanings.definition: Someone who sells or promotes phrases or expressions.
meanings.sent1: The phrasemongerings was well-known for his catchy slogans.
meanings.sent2: As a phrasemongerings, she had a way with words.
meanings.sent3: The phrasemongerings at the bookstore recommended the best sellers.
meanings.sent4: He was a phrasemongerings, weaving tales that captivated his audience.
meanings.sent5: The phrasemongerings charmed customers with his linguistic skills.
